--If you said 'y' to auto turn-in--
1. Place cursor on quest then press <ctrl+1>
2. Place cursor on turn-in then press <ctrl+2>
3. Continue to the next part
--OTHERWISE--
1. Press <ctrl+`> to start the program
2. Sit back, relax, and chill
3a. Press <ctrl+shift+q> to pause
-> 3b. Press <ctrl+`> to resume
4. Press <ctrl+q> to quit after unpausing
